about_the_game:
Welcome to the adorable world of Merge Cats, an irresistible idle game where you get to merge and collect a delightful array of charming feline friends. Immerse yourself in the joy of merging cats and watch as they evolve into new and captivating forms right before your eyes.

Start your journey with a few cute and cuddly kittens. Merge two identical cats to create a higher-level cat with enhanced features and unique traits. Keep merging and evolving your furry companions to unlock a variety of adorable and majestic cat breeds. From playful tabbies to regal Persians and elusive Siamese, each new cat brings its own personality and charm.

As you merge cats, they generate coins, allowing you to expand your cat collection even further. Use your earnings to acquire new kittens, upgrade existing cats, and unlock enchanting habitats for your feline friends to enjoy. Discover the joy of seeing your cat family grow and thrive as you progress through the game.

The more you merge, the faster your collection expands, and the more unique and rare cat breeds you'll discover.

Merge Cats offers a visually pleasing and captivating gameplay experience with charming animations and delightful sound effects. Immerse yourself in the world of adorable felines, where every merge brings a new surprise and a heartwarming sense of accomplishment.

With its relaxing and addictive gameplay, Merge Cats is perfect for cat lovers and idle game enthusiasts of all ages. Experience the joy of merging and collecting a diverse range of lovable cats, and let their charm bring a smile to your face. Are you ready to embark on a delightful journey of merging and discovering the ultimate collection of meow-tastic companions in Merge Cats?

How to Play:
- Merge cats to create premium cats
- Easily merge cats by drag and drop.
- The cats will automatically generate money in idle mode.
- Open gift boxes to own special gifts.
- Upgrade your cats in the shop to earn more money

Come and collect cute cats!

This is a relaxing addictive merge game.
Once you play, you will become addicted!
